item.title: Vue Guitar Chords
item.description: I was curious to learn more about VueJS, so I built a library to render and edit guitar chords.

item.title: Surf Media Gmbh
item.description: Built and tested web services in a microservices architecture for an advertising performance network using Java/Dropwizard and Python/Flask/DRF Developed a proxy server to interface with mobile devices as part of our automated ad-testing infrastructure
